levels.description:
ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, Attack Interval is <@ba.vup>slightly shortened</>, and attacks strike <@ba.vup>3</> enemies at once.
<$ba.overdrive>Overload</>: Attacks strike <@ba.vup>4</> times in a row with <@ba.vup>{attack@atk_scale_ol:0%}</> ATK, and randomly attack targets within attack range.
<@ba.rem>Skill can be manually deactivated</>
